nodes.excerpt: Gawq unravels echo chambers by serving you algorithm-free news, hyper-focused on transparency, social impact and unbiased reporting. Compare the news, mute the noise, and read between the headlines from over 150+ media sources daily.
nodes.title: Gawq - Unbreaking news. Stay informed, mindfully.
nodes.author: Joshua Dziabiak

nodes.excerpt: Zeta Joint Cards are designed for the modern couple. Couples get a joint account and two debit cards, allowing both partners to keep tabs on their shared finances including paying bills and saving together. Our goal is to make shared banking delightful.
nodes.title: Zeta Joint Cards - Shared banking for modern couples
nodes.author: Charles Hudson

nodes.excerpt: ProdEasy is a product management platform that smart teams use to put the customer at the center of all their product management activities.
nodes.title: Prodeasy - Product Management platform for the teams of all sizes
nodes.author: Kinshuk Kale

nodes.excerpt: A bot who helps to monitor Elon's twitter and notify you instantly via Discord app. You no longer have to keep refreshing on his twitter, or mess up your twitter notifications to just follow him.
nodes.title: Trade on Elon Tweets - Never missed any tweet, go buying before everyone knows.
nodes.author: Tony Phung

nodes.excerpt: Explo lets you build customer-facing dashboards that fit seamlessly into your existing application. Connect directly to your database or warehouse, build custom-styled dashboards, and embed in your application within a day.
nodes.title: Explo 2.0 - Customer-facing dashboards and reports - lightning fast
nodes.author: Gustaf AlstrÃ¶mer

nodes.excerpt: KooKit is a breakthrough MagSafe accessory that cools your phone while keeping it wirelessly charged. It tweaks between battery life and performance of your phone to make it run at its peak state for a prolonged period of time.
nodes.title: KooKit - Keep your phone cool & wirelessly charge at the same time

nodes.excerpt: Remotion allows you to make real MP4 videos written in React. Use web technologies like CSS, SVG, WebGL to make interesting motion graphics. Use programming to dynamically make different variants of videos and automate it using server-side rendering.
nodes.title: Remotion - Create videos programmatically in React
nodes.author: Jonny Burger

nodes.excerpt: Relocate.me is a 75,000-user strong niche job board for tech roles with relocation. It comes with a wealth of information on all things job relocation to help you decide where to move for work.
nodes.title: Relocate 3.0 - Get your next tech job abroad
nodes.author: Denis Dinkevich

nodes.excerpt: Goodbye, generic video chat! Virtual Venue lets you embed a branded virtual event space directly into your website. Instead of a hard-to-find Zoom link, create a persistent home where your community can gather.
nodes.title: Virtual Venue by Mixily - Host custom video gatherings right in your website
nodes.author: Andrew Badr

nodes.excerpt: CyberCat VPN is Your Unlimited, Encrypted, Fast & Ad Free VPN for iPhone & iPad. Welcome to a new world of internets with a super fast and secure no log VPN. Bring down the virtual walls and pounce on all the content you can handle.
nodes.title: CyberCat VPN - A privacy focused, Ad blocking, Unlimited VPN for iOS. Meow
nodes.author: James Stanley

nodes.excerpt: Planetary is a social media app built upon the idea of protocols not platforms. Users and creators own their identities and social relationships. Privacy is respected and creators supported. Abuse and harassment is handled through community governance.
nodes.title: Planetary - Decentralized social media by and for the people.
nodes.author: rabble

nodes.excerpt: Booste APIs boiling all the pains of the production ML stack into a single line of code. We're super excited to launch an API to OpenAI's powerful new no-training-needed image classifier to Python and Node. Give it a spin!
nodes.title: CLIP API by Booste - Use OpenAI's newest image classifier with one line of code.
nodes.author: Erik Dunteman

nodes.excerpt: Say hello to Paperform V3! Weâ€™ve just released a bunch of new features that make Paperform easier to use than ever before. Features include **Guided Mode**, Slash Commands, Background videos and more.
nodes.title: Paperform V3 - The best form builder just got better.
nodes.author: Dean McPherson

nodes.excerpt: Everything a senior needs in a single place. 70% of seniors are now online, but most of them still struggle to use the internet to its full potential. Urizen allows seniors to keep up with the pace and stay on top of their game.
nodes.title: Urizen - A simpler Google for seniors
nodes.author: Nicolas Venard

nodes.excerpt: Record your screen and webcam. No installation required. Protected by end-to-end encryption. Free to use on Windows, Mac, Linux, iOS, Android.
nodes.title: CALIPIO Screen Recorder - Free and secure screen recorder
nodes.author: Daniel Modler

nodes.excerpt: Everyone speaks the same language - visual ğŸŒ…. So make your backend - visual! Draw your backend architecture, code right in the browser, and execute - all on the same whiteboard. Forget about logs or having to guess what your code does. SEE it in real time ğŸ˜
nodes.title: STATEWIZE - Visual software development ecosystem. Draw + Code + Execute

nodes.excerpt: Did you ever wonder how much you would have earned if you'd invested $1,000 in todayâ€™s public companies IPOs?
nodes.title: One thousand in - How much would you have if you invested $1000 in an IPO?

nodes.excerpt: Anonymously vouch for the best engineers among your LinkedIn connections and get $1500 for everyone who gets hired. You get assured $20 for just syncing your LinkedIn. Help your friends get connected to top Y-Combinator founders directly. No recruiters.
nodes.title: Hiring Club - Recommend engineers to top startups and earn $1500 per hire
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: RapidReg - a scheduling and form building tool that includes all you need in one place, at a price you can't beat! Registrations, Form & survey builders, Availability calendars & online booking, Pricing and payments, and go green with planted trees!
nodes.title: RapidReg LTD - Forms, bookings & scheduler with no limits that plants trees

nodes.excerpt: Recursive is a puzzle game about recursion, patterns, and programming. It is the perfect game for people who love hard puzzles. Your goal is to help little robots collect all gems by finding the correct pattern and translating it into a short program.
nodes.title: Recursive! - A puzzle game about recursion, patterns, and programming.
nodes.author: Saber Chaabani
